meanings.definition: The dense layer of vascular connective tissue enveloping the bones except at the surfaces of the joints.
meanings.sent1: The periostea protects the bones with its dense layer.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the periostea to understand bone structure better.
meanings.sent3: The periostea decided to throw a party for the bones.
meanings.sent4: The periostea is like a shield, guarding the bones from harm.
meanings.sent5: I imagined the periostea as a cozy blanket wrapping around the bones.

meanings.definition: The membrane of connective tissue that closely invests all bones except at the articular surfaces.
meanings.sent1: We learned about the periostea in our anatomy class.
meanings.sent2: The periostea provides essential support to the bones.
meanings.sent3: The periostea loves to hug the bones tightly.
meanings.sent4: Her care for others was like the periostea, always there to protect.
meanings.sent5: The periostea is like a loyal guardian, never leaving the bones unprotected.
